MFM JS - just a simulator

Right now this is just a single tile simulation, with a few DRegs to seed the fun. Things are moving fast because 1000 event windows are happening every cycle.

Click and drag mouse to modify sites

  • No keys held - DREG
  • hold "e" - EMPTY
  • hold "w" - WALL
  • hold "r" - RES
  • MASON (wall builder)
    • hold "z" - build a 12x12 box
    • hold "Z (shift+z)" - build a 24x24 box
    • hold "x" - build wall going east (48 wide)
    • hold "c" - build wall going south (48 tall)
  • hold "b" - Fork Bomb (use with care)
  • hold "a" - Anti Fork Bomb (not perfect, but it sure is cool)
  • hold "s" - Sentry, he patrols and protects you from the Fork Bomb
